text:
The xindiceadmin.bat skips the CL-LOOP-part, if JAVA_HOME is not set (which it 
was not in my new XP setup), therefore no parameters are given to 
xindiceadmin, and then the help message is always returned. After setting 
JAVA_HOME, it works.
creator: gsp@textware.dk
vladimir@bossicard.com
text:
Can somebody test if adding these lines after the @echo off in file xindice.bat
solves the problem (sorry, I don't have Windows)  Well I'm not sorry at all :-)

rem find JAVA_HOME
if not "%JAVA_HOME%"==""
echo JAVA_HOME is not set and ant could not be located. Please set JAVA_HOME.
goto end

creator: gsp@textware.dk
text:
Adding these lines after the @echo off in both files xindiceadmin.bat and 
xindice.bat solves the problem

rem find JAVA_HOME
if not "%JAVA_HOME%"=="" goto javahomeset
echo JAVA_HOME is not set. Please set JAVA_HOME.
goto end
:javahomeset
